website_summaries.verdict: Gives a car that “don’t mess with me” look.
pros: Pistol grip gives a distinct feel in the hand when shifting
Durable and sleek from a trusted manufacturer
cons: Metal gets very hot in the sun

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Gets hot and cold with ambient cab temperatures
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Easy to install. I machined mine to accept an illuminated switch I liked better than the plain boring hurst button shifter. I do wish the edges of the pocket that’s cut in the middle of the shifter were de-burred better. They catch my palm sometimes while shifting.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: but I combined this puppy with a Hurst 3916030 Billet Plus Short Shift Manual Shifter for my 2010 Camaro SS and I gotta say it's the best setup I've ever seen in a Camaro
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey, but I combined this puppy with a Hurst 3916030 Billet Plus Short Shift Manual Shifter for my 2010 Camaro SS and I gotta say it's the best setup I've ever seen in a Camaro! Perfect combo for that old-school look!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Tru

customer_reviews.title: Looking back (1 year review)
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look and feel of this shift handle. I was infatuated for a month before the love faded. First; Yes it is amazing build quality. Sturdy feel. BURNS in the summer even with open windows. High 90s to 100s. Second; Thinking I would get used to the pistol grip was a mistake. I miss the ball grip all the time. (grew up on manual transmissions) Third; Did I mention it burns? Grievances aside it looks great and beside the burning it did nothing wrong to me. The reason for 3 stars is the feel. I just couldn't get into it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Sarron

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Shift Handle
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Well packaged. Included numerous adapters for just about any thread type. Lightweight yet solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Skewk

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best Hurst shift handle. Comes with different size thread adapters, which makes this purchase even better because you don't have to go hunting for the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete kit.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in an opened package missing the Adapter kit. So is basically a chunk of aluminum with no real use
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Description Sucks, but plenty of adapters
customer_reviews.text: Great grip, looks good, compatibility is excellent. Comes with tons of adapters. Works perfectly with 06 Ram.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: hurst ftw
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the coolest shift handle i have ever used. especially when it's cold outside. the one negative is that it gets really cold in the winter and i am sure it will get hot in the summer. aside from that this thing is amazing. the included adapters fit a wide range of thread sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Not made for a Challenger, but I make things fit. So I put some adhesive putty on the shifter, put the grip handle in place and voila. Instant badassness.
customer_reviews.author: the king of pencils and sharpeners

customer_reviews.title: 2017 Slingshot shifter
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely on my 2017 Slingshot. Came with several adapters-M10 fits.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, quality namebrand part. Nice grip. Quick, easy install. Only complaint is, due to its composition, it's can be either extremely cold or piping hot to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: BigDawg0114

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very easy install, nice little upgrade for inside the cab of my 5 speed Cummins, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely, perfect size for my hand anyway. Comes with tons of fittings to fit pretty much any car (with a manual shifter). Could get a bit hot in the summer sun though.
customer_reviews.author: J Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great in the hand. With all the fittings, fit right on my 2004 dodge
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Pistol Grip
customer_reviews.text: Well made, comfortable, and looks amazing...what more can you ask for. Unfortunately the package did not have the adapter screw I needed and ended up having to buy a separate adapter kit, which was no big deal. I have it in my 2012 Toyota Tacoma (automatic) and it a great looking accent piece for my truck!
customer_reviews.author: YFZ450

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, best upgrade you can do for cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my Hurst His & Hers shifter equipped 68 GTO. Looks way cooler than a round ball or the horizontal Hurst shifter. If it fits a GTO it will probably fit almost all old GM and Ford cars. There are a lot of adapters in the kit, so you find the one that fits, and tighten up your new bad-a$$ shifter level. Awesome, best upgrade you can do for cheap. A drunk monkey or idiotic human can install it in mere moments.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Klozoff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product fit perfectly and feels great in your hand! A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item came with more adapters then listens and fit my 2016 challenger with ease
customer_reviews.author: The metal chef

customer_reviews.title: I put in my Jeep Unlimited>>>
customer_reviews.text: Great accessory. Hurst was better in my 1969 camaro in 1976 but it has the same appeal. although I delude myself that im getting 375 hp out of my Jeep V-6. Maybe i'll put on a hooker headers sticker on my window too.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Gelf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Best shifter i have ever owned! I put it on a 1999 s10 xtreme. sleak durable and all else its a hurst
customer_reviews.author: Joe Heaston

customer_reviews.title: Great Shift Handle!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the PEFECT upgrade!!!! I have a MGW short throw linkage and it was kinda notchy with the ball or Tee handle. The Pistol Grip gives the leverage needed to feel perfect. Very happy with the look and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Hurst Pistol Grip Shifter
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks AWESOME!! Put it in my 1987 Pontiac Fiero GT without any issues. Love the look and feel of it, makes holding the shifter a ton easier!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... tri-x short throw shifter and after install it felt like the stock throw shifter
customer_reviews.text: I have a 01 mustang with a tri-x short throw shifter and after install it felt like the stock throw shifter. Also it gets more than comfortably hot on high way drive and when it sits in the sun. Like the look, don't like the funtuallity
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but absolutely not "universal"
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit on 2012 camry se. Kind of surprised since it claimed it was universal. Pretty disappointed but good quality product if you have a vehicle it'll fit on
customer_reviews.author: jack fossler
